# This file contains keys with security issues

# DSA key - deprecated and weak
ssh-dss AAAAB3NzaC1kc3MAAACBAJzY5MhFdMR9K5+XMBN8Z8Uy5RTHVZ3UiMQE8z5Z6YvXqU0MkQ4LpN0ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP1234567890abcdefghijk old-dsa-key@legacy

# Key without source restriction (no from=) for root - critical
ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIGsqP5+FFpB4sP0JaZ3EZVrFqXpQR8HfnLWLbYZlMxyz root-key@admin

# Key with dangerous command option
command="/bin/bash" ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIDangerousCmdKeyABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP1234567890xyz dangerous-shell@attacker

# Key with agent forwarding enabled - security risk
permit-agent-forwarding ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIAgentForwardKeyABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP1234567890xyz forward@risky

# Key with concerning comment
ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAISharedKeyABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP1234567890xyshared shared-access-temp

# Short RSA key - weak (simulated 1024 bit)
ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAABgQC weak-rsa-1024@oldserver
